channel.title: people on erg home
channel.description: Recent content in people on erg home

item.description: eg was founded in 2022 by John Kulas (aka “John-o”), an Industrial and Organizational Psychologist. The focus of the consultancy is on Statistical and Psychometric applications. The mission of eg includes a continuation of collaboration and mentorship for graduate students in Industrial and Organizational Psychology, and these students contribute to eg via contract assignments. Dr. Kulas’ resume can be accessed here. Contact eg: John-o Kulas 651-216-3353 jtkulas@ergreports.com Minneapolis, MN 55421
